info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 4:14PM EST until December 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Massachusetts...Connecticut... Connecticut River At Montague affecting Franklin and Hampshire Counties. Connecticut River At Hartford affecting Hartford and Middlesex Counties. Connecticut River At Thompsonville affecting Hampden and Hartford Counties. Connecticut River At Northampton affecting Hampden and Hampshire Counties. Connecticut River At Middle Haddam affecting Middlesex County. Farmington River At Simsbury affecting Hartford County. For the Connecticut River...including Montague, Middle Haddam, Northampton, Hartford, Thompsonville...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Farmington River...including Simsbury...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Connecticut River at Thompsonville. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 17.0 feet, Flooding will become more widespread along the Connecticut River from the Massachusetts towns of Agawam and Longmeadow, through the northern Connecticut towns of Suffield and Enfield. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 16.5 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 3:30 PM EST Tuesday was 16.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon and continue falling to 14.1 feet early Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 16.6 feet on 05/06/1972. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1000 AM EST.
